name: Frog Simulator (Brandaboss)
description:
CONTROLS:

- WASD or arrow keys to move around

-left click to attack

-aim attack with the mouse (only for the frog phase of the game)

TIPS:

-Eat to get XP and eventually grow up (larvae and dragonflies give extra XP).

-Avoid snakes or you'll get eaten.

- Snakes can't go in the water during the frog phase.
